frontmatter.title: Changelogs
frontmatter.meta_title: MStore Multi Vendor - Complete React Native template for WooCommerce
frontmatter.meta_description: You are shop-owners of physical stores with high-traffic consumers and think to go digital. Or you are online shop-owners with E-Commerce websites. Both of you want to maximize sale opportunities.  You are developers who are challenged to develop store mobile application in a shorter time.  You question how can MStore help. Here are your answers.

markdownRemark.html:
Release Change Logs

version 1.2.0 (08/01/2019):

1. New - support WC Vendor, new demo website: http://handy.mstore.io and Expo: https://shrtm.nu/uxjM
2. New - Vendor User can add new Product - https://shrtm.nu/ur79
3. New - Vendor List UI - https://shrtm.nu/kCK1
4. New - Integration with the CeBuilder - https://shrtm.nu/LtW9
5. Update - Homepage screen and category list - https://shrtm.nu/BJ8e
6. Update - bottom tab navigation and ChatList/Cart to the More menu items. - https://shrtm.nu/UojL
7. Update - upgrade performance issues
8. Update - document guide 
9. Update latest library and minor bug fixed.

Notes: please make sure update the latest mstore-checkout to v1.1.3 - https://shrtm.nu/Ya7h and run the Generate image from https://wordpress.org/plugins/regenerate-thumbnails/ plugin to update all the product image!

version 1.1.2 (26/11/2018):

1. NEW - Add new Rehub theme demo - http://rehub.mstore.io
2. UPDATE - New document guide https://inspireui.github.io/mstore-mv
2. UPDATE - Minor bug fix and performance improve

version 1.1.1 (30/10/2018):

1. NEW - Add new Vendor page and show more Vendor Info (email, address, rating...)
2. UPDATE - Filter issues
2. UPDATE - Homepage UI issues

version 1.1.0 (30/10/2018):**

1. NEW - Add amazing new Dark theme, bring up to 2x product value.
2. NEW - Add Chat Feature between Vendor & users.
3. NEW - Ability to Sign up as the Vendor
4. NEW - Category quick view on the homepage (Circle layout)
5. NEW - Image banner to support for your promotion
6. NEW - Filter & Search improvement, support Recent Search history
7. UPDATE - fully support multi-language with WPML plugin and RTL options
8. UPDATE - performance tuning up for Android device
9. UPDATE - minor bug fix and latest Expo library update.

version 1.0.1 (16/07/2018):**

1. Add filter by Vendor on Search page
2. Fix font size issue at custom page
3. Update search UX and search result list
4. Performance tuning up and minor bug fixed

version 1.0.0 (12/07/2018):

 Release first version
